title: Fresh pumpkin pie
ingredients: ['1 medium sugar pumpkin', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 recipe pastry for a 23cm pie', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '4 eggs, lightly beaten', '350g honey, warmed slightly', '125ml milk', '125ml whipping cream']
